text: Agustín Jerónimo de Iturbide y Huarte (30 September 1807 – 11 December 1866) was the eldest son of the first Emperor of Mexico, Agustín I of Mexico. He was the heir apparent to the First Mexican Empire and a member of the Imperial House of Iturbide. Category:1807 births Category:1866 deaths Category:People of the Mexican War of Independence
title: Agustín Jerónimo de Iturbide y Huarte
